price: (37) To whoever wills among you to proceed[1794] or stay behind.
arabic: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمۡ أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوۡ يَتَأَخَّرَ
footnotes: [1794]- To righteousness by acceptance of the warning.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: liman shāa minkum an yataqaddama aw yata-akhara
